title: Simon Yates Crowned Giro d’Italia Winner, Kooij Adds Exclamation Point in Visma’s Final Weekend Blitz
content:
A few favorites crashed or faded, and rising stars like Del Toro and Gee confirmed GC promise in a wild three weeks at the Giro d'Italia.

Read the full article at Simon Yates Crowned Giro d’Italia Winner, Kooij Adds Exclamation Point in Visma’s Final Weekend Blitz on Velo.
author: ahood
